data.title: $25 billion wiped off Sony this year as chip crunch hits PlayStation 5, Microsoft competition heats up
data.description: Sony cut its full-year sales target for the PlayStation 5 from from 14.8 million units to 11.5 million units as the global chip shortage has hit production.
